name: ActionBarItemComponent

inputsClass.name: groupId
inputsClass.rawdescription: If a group id is set, the action bar with the same group id is only rendered once.
inputsClass.description: If a group id is set, the action bar with the same group id is only rendered once.

inputsClass.name: inGroupPriority
inputsClass.rawdescription:
If action bar items has the same groupId, only one is displayed.
Action bar item with the same groupId that has highest inGroupPriority is displayed.
inputsClass.description: If action bar items has the same groupId, only one is displayed. Action bar item with the same groupId that has highest inGroupPriority is displayed.

inputsClass.name: injector
inputsClass.rawdescription: Allows to define a different injector.

inputsClass.name: itemClass
inputsClass.rawdescription: Adds additional classes to the item.

inputsClass.name: placement
inputsClass.rawdescription:
Where the item should be shown. Use "more" to place
it in a dropdown on the right.
inputsClass.description: Where the item should be shown. Use "more" to place it in a dropdown on the right.

inputsClass.name: priority
inputsClass.rawdescription:
Priority for sorting the list. Higher priority means
an earlier position in the list.
inputsClass.description: Priority for sorting the list. Higher priority means an earlier position in the list.

description:
A can be added with content projection. It allows to show items in three positions (left, right or more).

Example :
<c8y-action-bar-item [placement]="'right'">
  <button class="btn btn-link" (click)="addRandom()"><i c8yIcon="plus-circle"></i> Add random</button>
</c8y-action-bar-item>
rawdescription: A can be added with content projection. It allows to show items in three positions (left, right or more). ```html ```
